thread.title: 5-year-old boy left alone on day care bus for 5 hours
thread.title_full: 5-year-old boy left alone on day care bus for 5 hours

title: 5-year-old boy left alone on day care bus for 5 hours
text:
Authorities say 5-year-old boy left alone on day care bus for 5 hours in Florida 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/10/15 10:00 am EDT - Updated: 10/10/15 10:00 am EDT 
ORLANDO, Florida â€” Authorities are investigating after they say a preschool and child care facility left a 5-year-old boy alone on a bus for five hours. 
Orange County Sheriff's officials said someone was walking through the parking lot at 1 p.m. Friday when they spotted the boy and called 911. Authorities said he had been in the bus since about 8 a.m. Sheriff's spokesman Jane Watrel told the Orlando Sentinel ( http://tinyurl.com/osseqgy ) that the bus driver and two employees at Winner's Preschool and Child Care on North Powers Drive could face neglect charges. 
The facility declined comment. 
The National Weather Service reported temperatures climbed to 86 degrees during that time with a heat index of 94 degrees. 
The boy was returned to his parents in good condition. 
The Department of Children and Families licenses day cares and has been notified. 
Information from: Orlando Sentinel, http://www.orlandosentinel.com/
